::Shadow Wing::

She looked at the gun in her hand. She lowered it and put is away.
"Sorry about the gun.  I thought you were the pred who was following 
me."  She looked at him and looked away. She said in a soft tone, "i 
figured the storm would disrupt the preds reading enough so he 
couldn't find me."  She thought for a moment. She turned and looked 
at him. "Why were you doing a recon out here for? There is nothing 
out here but snow and ice." She was mad at herself for being careless 
and letting him find her. "And just what do you want me to explain?"




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> "Hello Wing" Lunarpine replied as she stood up. he ducked down 
> realizing her gun was drawn."I was following your scent. it was 
> leading me toward the pile." "Smart move, hiding like that. Dumb 
move 
> hiding in a storm." Lunarpine lowered his arms to his side hoping 
> Shadow Wing would do the same. "I was doing a routine recon when I 
> caught your scent, care to explain?" Lunarpine wasn't happy with 
the  trouble he'd gone through just to have her stick a gun in his 
face.
